segments.text: Good morning , welcome to Bank of the USA . How may I help you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , I need to transfer some money to another account . It ’ s urgent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , have you made a wire transfer at our bank before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I ’ Ve never made a transfer before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s alright , I will take you through the procedure . Are you transferring funds to a company or an individual account ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A company account . I need to pay a bill .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , I ’ ll need the name of the company and their bank routing number as well as their bank ’ s address and phone number .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have all the information in this folder .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . You ’ Ve come prepared.You have all the necessary materials so we can go ahead and make the transfer right now . It ’ s a simple transaction , and we can process it today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that ’ s such a relief . I didn ’ t want the payment to be overdue . Thank you so much .
segments.speaker: S2
